CSIR CSMCRI Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Project Associate Jobs
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 23, 2025, 14:33 IST
 Council of Scientific & Industrial Research
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 23-Aug-2025 |  Gujarat |  Salary : 25,000 to 25,000




FOLLOW

The Central Salt and Marine Chemicals Research Institute (CSIR CSMCRI) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Associate Jobs. Those candidates wo have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech In Mechanical Engineering, Civil Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the CSIR CSMCRI Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interestd and eligible candidates can attend the interview at the address given below.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Gujarat.

CSIR CSMCRI Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No. of Vacancies	Qualification
Project Associate 	01	B.E/ B.Tech. In Mechanical Engineering, Civil Engineering

Age Limit for the CSIR CSMCRI Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 35 years.

Selection Process for the CSIR CSMCRI Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the CSIR CSMCRI Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 25,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the CSIR CSMCRI Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the CSIR CSMCRI Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Project Associate Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Then, attend the interview at the address mentioned in the official notification.

Important Dates

Date of Walk-in-Interview	09-09-2025
Official Notification	Click Here
Application form	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
